channel.title: 317 Chat Logs
channel.description: Hey guys, I want to make it so myself (and hopefully staff) can read all of the chat logs. I don't care how it's set up, I just want a way of everything that's said on the server to be all in one place. How would I go about doing this?

item.title: 317 Chat Logs
item.dc:creator: @official_garrscape official_garrscape
item.description:
@official_garrscape wrote:

Hey guys, I want to make it so myself (and hopefully staff) can read all of the chat logs. I don’t care how it’s set up, I just want a way of everything that’s said on the server to be all in one place. How would I go about doing this?
